content:
The sappers of the Russian army were swept away by the current on an anti-submarine mine they had previously installed.

About thisinformDefense forces of South of Ukraine.

The video shows how the instant karma for the occupiers who tried to leave their dangerous garbage in Ukraine.

"When trying to install a prototic mine, their motor was drawn into the same mine," - the message reads.

Recall SCO snipersshowedhow the occupiers are destroyed in the Avdiivsky direction.

As reported by the Armyinform, Commander -in -Chief of the Armed Forcesshowed the footage of destructionequipment and weapons of the Russians.
title: Instant Karma in Action: Russian sappers exploded on their own protracic mini
